copyFromNetworkId.description: The ID of the network to copy configuration from. Other provided parameters will override the copied configuration, except type which must match this network's type exactly.

disableMyMerakiCom.description: Disables the local device status pages (my.meraki.com, ap.meraki.com, switch.meraki.com, wired.meraki.com). Optional (defaults to false)

disableRemoteStatusPage.description: Disables access to the device status page (http://[device's LAN IP]). Optional. Can only be set if disableMyMerakiCom is set to false

name.description: The name of the new network

tags.description: A space-separated list of tags to be applied to the network

timeZone.description: The timezone of the network. For a list of allowed timezones, please see the 'TZ' column in the table in this article.

type.description: The type of the new network. Valid types are wireless, appliance, switch, systemsManager, camera, cellularGateway, environmental, or a space-separated list of those for a combined network.
